tooltip.daggerlance.lore.default:
Shift right click on an anvil or
smithing table to change skin
tooltip.daggerlance.lore.vana:
A good example of barrens craftsmanship. Vana is an ore used by barrens 
that is found in their dimension. After many years they have mastered using vana
to the point that they can make advance items that nobody can replicate.
This is purely designed to permanently harm your opponent, a dead soldier is 
the proof of how strong their will is, an injured one is the proof of how far
barrens will to go to make you suffer before death
